level.text: The voting members of the Task Force shall adopt and sign a Memorandum of Understanding regarding the implementation of the Reform Plan, which shall be submitted to the Council.
This chapter shall expire upon the submission of the Memorandum of Understanding to the Council pursuant to subsection (a) of this section.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 6 of Special Education Task Force Establishment Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-232, November 25, 2003, 50 DCR 10729).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-39
level.text: For Law 15-39, see notes following ยง 38-160.
